name: Flight Controls Demo
description:
Controls:

Move using left mouse button pressed (touch simulation).

Fire: Space bar

5 minutes interactive demo showing different camera view styles (Follow, Fixed, Cinematic), flight controls (horizontal and vertical orbit around, camera relative) and multi-touch interaction (only mobile version).

Props made with Pro-Builder.

Free font from Paul Flo Williams http://hisdeedsaredust.com/ (Thanks!)
